mapper.select: SELECT t2.biid, t2.biname, t3.uname, t1.homeworkURL, t4.arrangementTime, t1.completionTime FROM t_checkhomework t1 INNER JOIN t_babyinf t2 ON t1.babyId = t2.biid INNER JOIN t_user t3 ON t2.uid = t3.uid INNER JOIN t_publishhomework t4 ON t1.classId = t4.classId WHERE t1.classId = #{classId};
